title: 04/15/2021 - Hour 3 - Howard Beck
itunes:title: 04/15/2021 - Hour 3 - Howard Beck
description:
Chris Broussard and Rob Parker react to the breaking news of Lamarcus Aldridge's sudden retirement, Chris wonders if there's any reason at all for Steph Curry to ponder leaving Golden State, Sports Illustrated senior NBA writer Howard Beck joins the show, and the guys debate the MVP candidacy of some guys in the NBA.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
